text: E a yi'aali ɓen wi'ananooɓe : "Suree juuɗe mon ɗen, ñimnon julde, jonnon asakal". Tuma hare nden farlanoo e maɓɓe, e jaka fedde goo e maɓɓe hino hulira yimɓe ɓen wano Alla hulirtee, maa ko ɓuri tiiɗude e kulol, ɓe wi'i: "Joomi amen, ko honɗum Farlaɗaa e dow amen hare ? Ko haɗnoo Nennitanaa men ɗum haa e lajal ɓadiingal ?" Maaku : "Dakamme aduna on ko seeɗa, ko laakara on ɓuri moƴƴannde on hulɗo [Alla], on tooñetaake yeru hufol tamara
